message.body: erin has a history of bronchial diseases
it's like 3 days of antibiotics and then she should be fine
so where you been all morning bunk?
putting an ad up on CL
is this part of your biz plan?
even though i don't care enough to execute it
i haven't even had a chance to think about that tacoma yet
obviously don't want to go down there and try to negotiate a price because I will basically take whatever they give me because I don't want to walk away empty handed at that point
Kristen's car needs 1500 in work to it
so we just want to trade it in for at this point if we can get something like 3k for it
but you pretty much have to trade a car in at the dealership you are buying the new car from right?
i know some places buy used cars
and if that is the case, they see we are from pennsylvania and low ball us on the trade in because they know they have us by the balls
maybe trade in up in PA if possible
yeah or get the assesment in PA from a "sister" dealership or something
so we have agreed on price in PA then drive down to charlotte and officially trade it in
don't even know if that is possible though
what's the work needed on the Blazer?
Cadillac converter and tune up and some other shit. it hasn't been running real smooth lately
other thing that is tough is you don't want to drive all the way down there and the truck not to be what you want
but that truck does look sweet
my only nitpicky thing would be the decals on the end of the beds
I hate the ones that don't have it
why does it have to have that?
and it is the sport package
so it has more add ons
but I like the look too
either way--it's a bad ass truck
so when you going to decide whether to make moves on it?
it was owned by a bear hunter and is all scratched up
how did you find that out?
i guess you can't really see it in the pictures
called to find out how to proceed
I think all along the sides
I thought it was too good to be true
that was a hell of a deal
I was ready to buy it
and they can't buff out the scratches?
that one in DuBois is pretty awesome too
I guess that guy brings in his truck for a new one every couple years
and they try to buff out the scratches as best they can
yeah the dubois one is nice
I just like black so much more
doesn't have the package though you were looking at
yeah and the wheels not crazy about
dont want to spend that much
plus don't think it is very smart buying a new car
yeah, but it is PIMP as shit
doesn't really show me any pictures
yeah I have gone through that before
I am kind of glad I can't see it because I will be too jealous
and I will compare all of them that
i'm the devil on your shoulder
so you just have to type in manual as a search term
and half are and half arent
it also has an aftermarket CD player
and I kind of don't like the look of the cd player area on the tacomas
Flyers are rumored to be close to a big trade
but doesn't have your package right?
i really like that DuBois, but the black one's do look badass
but I could live without it if I had to
if that one was manual it would be a no brainer
sucks that cars.com can't search by tranny
I wish I didn't need a manual
but I don't think I can sacrafice that
personally, i would sacrifice color first
cause it isn't like silver is a bad option
yeah i would sacrifice color before manual
but man I just want my truck the way i want it
but it is so hard to find
would you want a V6 probably?
what do you think of this one color wise
tough to tell how "blue" it is
it is a little jacked up too
not too much though I don't think
how hard would it be to have it lowered to factory level?
number of owners isnt a concern
i am the 3rd owner of my current car
just pointing out that it adds a layer of history to the car
yeah that really isn't a concern for me
and that since it's a 2009 (this will be its 3rd sale in 3 years)
but i think it looks sweet
def like the gray better than the blue
i wonder how much it would cost to get a car repainted or fixed up if it is all scratched up
the guy said they try to buff it out as much as possible
but just said with doing something over the phone he wanted to let me know
since you can't tell in the pictures
could they send you tighter photos?
yeah someone is supposed to follow up with me
supposedly they are getting snow down there
$249 for Ambassador Paint Job with coupon
yeah but I am sure it depends on the depth of the scratches and shit you know
that seems cheap as shit though
ill buy any car and get it painted black
that's for the lowest level of their paint jobs
just read some reviews and it sounds like they are pretty shitty
you and your damn discerning taste
i hate to be so picky but I am
the manual option is what kills e
has to be a Tacoma, huh?
yeah its got to be the tacoma
alan branch is a waste of money
but no way I am spending that much money on a truck - It would make me care too much about it
as far as getting scratched and shit
same thing happened with my GTI
and I don't really want to worry about that
i mean that silver one is DuBois has everything
the one in dubois is gone
tht one has hte gay wheels
yep dubois is no longer listed
i just rained on your parade
sorry bunk my computer was being gay
the private seller is having a baby too
blue book for good condition is 23950
i get a free beer from you if you buy that
you are better at tacoma finding then this argument
so we are essentially disagree on whether the Eagles will release him or not?
but I don't think you can say there is no way they will
if you say that then I guess we do
i don't think he'll be released
i mean obvs i can't say 0%
so the fiscally conservative eagles will pay roughly 4million for a backup QB?
he'll be on the team at whatever cap number
they are in no cap danger
it is money out of their pockets
and the eagles have proven to be tight in the pockets EVEN when salary cap has nothing to do with it
that's not that much money to a big market franchise like the Eagles
so why spend 4 million on Vick?
he is not a wildcat QB
he does not have value there
I think Reid probably thinks he is
then why did he get so few touches?
reid talked about Vick having a serious impact this year
Vick is a good runner when shit breaks down
i'm tired of this argument already
but if not I think he'll be on the Eagles
the Eagles should already know the market for him
if they don't think they can trade him and don't want the salary
then they would release him now
but by them holding on to him, it tells me 2 things
1. They think they can trade him
2. They might be moving another QB (McNabb) because then if it's just Kolb, they have a veteran option if things go poorly
so i'm sure the exact opposite will happen
